login.wrongPassword: Your phone number or password is incorrect

register.brandingSlogan: Connect with your close friends and those close to heart.
register.passwordHint: Your password needs to contain at least 8 characters and a number.
register.passwordNotSufficient: Your password needs to contain at least 8 characters with a number.
register.whyPhoneNumber: We will use your phone number to recover your account in the event you forget your password.
register.phoneInvalid: The phone number you provided is not valid.
register.phoneAlreadyInUse: This phone number is already linked to an account. Login instead?
register.phoneVerifyHint: We will verify the number via SMS in the next step.

verify.checkPhone: Please check messages on your phone.
verify.sentCode: We have sent a 6 digit code to
verify.otpInvalid: This OTP has either expired or is invalid. Please request for a new one.

recover.subtitle: Reset your password using your linked phone number.
recover.setNewPasswordSubtitle: Set a new password for your account.
recover.phoneNumberNoExist: This phone number doesn't match any existing account.
recover.otpInvalid: This recovery code has either expired or is invalid. Please request for a new one.

smsMessages.verifyPhone:
Hello {selectedUser.Name}. You are almost done creating your KampongTalk account.

We need you to verify this phone number in order to complete the creation of your account.

Please enter the code below into KampongTalk:
{otpRecord.Metadata} (Valid for 10mins)
smsMessages.recoverAccount:
Hello {selectedUser.Name} (@{selectedUser.Uid2}). A password reset was requested for your KampongTalk account.

If this action is done by you, please enter the following into KampongTalk:
{otpRecord.Metadata} (Valid for 10mins)

If you did not request for this, ignore and delete this message. DO NOT GIVE this code to anyone, including KampongTalk staff.

preferences.audioCuesDesc: Sounds effects will be used when interacting with KampongTalk.

doneStep.accountSetup: Your Account is all set up!
doneStep.guidedTourQn: Do you wish to take a guided tour around KampongTalk?
doneStep.takeToKTDirectly: Take me to the Kampong directly

empty.bringKtToLife: Write a new post to bring the Kampong to life.

empty.noEvents: There are no events to display.
empty.scrollToEnd: Wow, it looks like you've scrolled to the bottom of the KampongBoard!

createPost.noSuggComms: There are no communities to display.

detail.noComms: No comments have been left on this post.

digimap.name: Digital Void deck

support.subject: Subject

guides.tip: Tip: If you're stuck on a page, help is just a click away
guides.boardDesc: Share about yourself. Engage with others.
guides.commsDesc: Find posts by topics and interests.
guides.voidDeckDesc: Meet new people in your neighbourhood.
guides.eventsDesc: Participate in and create fun events.
guides.settingsDesc: Customise the app to fit your needs.

map.intro1: This is where you can access all the features of KampongTalk.
map.intro2: Here, you can access your private messages.
map.intro3: Have a specific interest or hobby? Find posts grouped by topics here.
map.intro4: At the Void Deck, you can find and meet new people in the neighbourhood.
map.intro5: Here, you can view and create posts. Share about your day, or catch up with friends.
map.intro7: Looking for a way to pass the time? Browse and create engaging events here.
map.intro8: Click here to close the map and return to your previous page.
map.intro10: View and customise your profile here.
map.intro12: Click this button to exit Kampong Talk.

board.intro1: Here, you can share about your day, or catch up with friends.
board.intro2: Select which type of posts you would like to see - All of them, or just those from friends.
board.intro3: View the posts here. Click 'Like' if you enjoy the content, and 'Reply' to view replies or leave your own.
board.intro4: Here are the most popular communities currently.
board.intro5: Here are the most popular upcoming events.
board.intro6: Click here to write a post.

communities.intro1: Find posts grouped by topics here.
communities.intro2: If your ideal community does not exist yet, you could start your own.
communities.intro4: Browse the most popular communities on KampongTalk.

voidDeck.intro1: Here, you can find and meet new people in the neighbourhood.
voidDeck.intro2: Each chatroom represents a different neighbourhood. Enter one and chat with those inside.
